long_description: The ultralight Marmot Ether Hoodie jacket provides a wind-resistant, water-repellent and breathable layer, equipping kids to stay comfortable in rapidly changing weather. Polyester shell shrugs off wind and light precipitation while allowing body vapor to escape; underarm vents further enhance breathability. DriClime(R) lining wicks moisture away from the skin to help keep kids cool and dry. Non-binding Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves preserve full range of motion. Elastic cuffs and a roll-up hood enhance weather protection. The Marmot Ether Hoodie jacket features reflective trim, zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket.
short_description: The ultralight Marmot Ether Hoodie jacket provides a wind-resistant, water-repellent and breathable layer, equipping kids to stay comfortable in rapidly changing weather.
